short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to automatically hide Nimo tv's channel shop bars making it similar to Twitch's Theater mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plugin to automatically hide Nimo tv's channel shop bars and enter theater mode for a better experience.
